name: Belinda William
review: Sunglasses are very comfortable, sit well and look great. I found velvety material of the case unsuitable for glasses, because fabric leaves traces on lenses and they have to be cleaned every time before you use them. Packaging, delivery and timing were very good.

name: Bennett Hines
review: Love these sunglasses! I have been looking for these for months and was considering a similar pair of Prada sunglasses but I found a better deal on these Miu Miu sunglasses and I love them! However, I wish the lenses were a little more protective because the lenses are a light grey shade and they aren't polarized so I feel they don't do much when it comes to protecting your eyes from the sun but they are super cute and fashion forward.

name: Willa Copeland
review: It's beautiful and great price for it ,and amazing seller and great customer support ! Highly recommend it !defiantly will shop for a new shade again !

name: Stanley Wall
review: Its colors are excellent and it is worth trusting

name: Johnson Ray
review: Love the look!! They sit well on the bridge of my nose. Good quality.

name: Bolton Sloan
review: Same shades as in store but half the price!!! Looks great on. It's amazing. Looking forward to get other colo

name: Suarez Torres
review: I was confused because I hadn't tried it at store before I bought, but when I got, I love it, fit my face and I was happy with the price and shipping. Thanks.

name: Mann Ayers
review: Totally the same as in Sunglass hut, but the prize is soooo attractive here! I love it.

name: Estella Frazier
review: Good quality product, love these sunglasses. Fast shipment. Thank You!

name: Kristy Fields
review: Just as promissed, in excelent conditions
